speaker.whotheyare: BCG's Shervin Khodabandeh helps businesses get real impact from AI by working with them to build game-changing capabilities.
speaker.whylisten:
Shervin Khodabandeh is a managing director and senior partner at Boston Consulting Group and coleads its AI business in North America. He has more than 20 years of experience bringing AI to the real world, having built game-changing AI solutions for some of the world's premier brands in consumer, retail, financial services, travel and healthcare. He is an expert in organization-wide AI transformations and has led several research projects on the topic.

Prior to BCG, Khodabandeh helped cofound a big data/AI firm Opera Solutions, where he was the global head of consulting. He's also worked as an engagement manager at global consultancy Mitchell Madison Group and has been on the advisory board of several tech and start-up firms. Khodabandeh holds a PhD from California Institute of Technology in chemical engineering, has two patents for engineering inventions and has published multiple articles.
